title: This $2 Hanes Tank Is Kendall Jenner's Style Secret - and Tinx Cracked the Case
description: Image Source: Photo by Brian Babineau | NBAE via Getty Images I'm a long-time Kendall Jenner fan - I appreciate the model's fashion, taste in men (hello, Bad Bunny), 818 Tequila line, and her POV on all things life and wellness. She's just plain cool. So when I saw her style for Game 4 of the Eastern Conference NBA Semifinals, I remember thinking: leave it to Jenner to make a simple outfit look high fashion. Well, the internet apparently agreed, and influencer and podcast host Tinx sussed it out: that effortless and sheer white tank top Jenner's wearing? Yeah, that's a boys' tank from Hanes and costs less than $2. The Hanes Boys Ecosmart Cotton Tank ($10) comes in a pack of five and has a sheerness that's perfect for making a fun bra pop. We've got to hand it to Tinx for blowing the lid off this. While we can't officially confirm that this is the exact tank Jenner wore to the game, Tinx tried it on herself and, well, it looks identical. "The other day, I was fixating on this picture because Kendall's white tank is perfect, so I asked my loving community of fellow shopaholics, 'Where do you guys think it's from?'" she explained in her TikTok video. "They all said Hanes. I have on good authority it's a Hanes Boys Tank." @tinx #greenscreen ♬ original sound - Tinx What Size Should You Get in the Hanes Boys Cotton Tank? Now, it's important to note that this tank top comes in boys' sizing. Tinx got herself a large, and it fit her well - so I'll be ordering the same. The good news is it comes pre-shrunk, so you won't have to worry about it shriveling up in the washer or dryer. And because it's designed with a smooth, tagless interior and made of 50 percent polyester and 50 percent cotton, you can count on it feeling comfortable, too. The best part? It's incredibly easy to pair with leggings or shorts - way easier to style than a bodysuit - which makes it that much more wearable. If you really want to recreate Jenner's Game 4 style, you can even add a Knicks Hat ($37) to go with it. Either way, a five-pack of tank tops will never go to waste. Haley Lyndes is a shopping writer and editor with more than seven years of experience in the publishing space. Specializing in home and lifestyle, she covers everything from furniture and mattresses to beauty products and fitness gear. Previously, she was an SEO commerce writer for Apartment Therapy and The Kitchn. Her writing has appeared in Buzzfeed, Travel & Leisure, and Real Simple. When she's not reviewing her latest home finds or interviewing celebrities, you'll likely find her out for a run - she's also a marathoner.
author: Haley Lyndes
excerpt: Kendall Jenner’s Game 4 NBA outfit featured a simple white tank — and influencer Tinx just revealed it's a $2 Hanes boys’ tee. Here’s where to get it.

html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

I'm a long-time Kendall Jenner fan — I appreciate the model's fashion, taste in men (hello, Bad Bunny), 818 Tequila line, and her POV on all things life and wellness. She's just plain cool. So when I saw her style for Game 4 of the Eastern Conference NBA Semifinals, I remember thinking: leave it to Jenner to make a simple outfit look high fashion. Well, the internet apparently agreed, and influencer and podcast host Tinx sussed it out: that effortless and sheer white tank top Jenner's wearing? Yeah, that's a boys' tank from Hanes and costs less than $2. The Hanes Boys Ecosmart Cotton Tank ($10) comes in a pack of five and has a sheerness that's perfect for making a fun bra pop.

We've got to hand it to Tinx for blowing the lid off this. While we can't officially confirm that this is the exact tank Jenner wore to the game, Tinx tried it on herself and, well, it looks identical. "The other day, I was fixating on this picture because Kendall's white tank is perfect, so I asked my loving community of fellow shopaholics, 'Where do you guys think it's from?'" she explained in her TikTok video. "They all said Hanes. I have on good authority it's a Hanes Boys Tank."

What Size Should You Get in the Hanes Boys Cotton Tank?

Now, it's important to note that this tank top comes in boys' sizing. Tinx got herself a large, and it fit her well — so I'll be ordering the same. The good news is it comes pre-shrunk, so you won't have to worry about it shriveling up in the washer or dryer. And because it's designed with a smooth, tagless interior and made of 50 percent polyester and 50 percent cotton, you can count on it feeling comfortable, too. The best part? It's incredibly easy to pair with leggings or shorts — way easier to style than a bodysuit — which makes it that much more wearable. If you really want to recreate Jenner's Game 4 style, you can even add a Knicks Hat ($37) to go with it. Either way, a five-pack of tank tops will never go to waste.

Haley Lyndes is a shopping writer and editor with more than seven years of experience in the publishing space. Specializing in home and lifestyle, she covers everything from furniture and mattresses to beauty products and fitness gear. Previously, she was an SEO commerce writer for Apartment Therapy and The Kitchn. Her writing has appeared in Buzzfeed, Travel & Leisure, and Real Simple. When she's not reviewing her latest home finds or interviewing celebrities, you'll likely find her out for a run — she's also a marathoner.
